sentences.sContent: He was unnerved by the way Sylvia kept staring at him.
sentences.sCn: 西尔维娅一直盯着他看，让他觉得心里发慌。

synos.tran: 使失去勇气；使身心交疲；使焦躁；使失常

words.tran: 使失去气力，使丧失勇气，使焦躁（unnerve的ing形式）
使失去气力；使焦躁（unnerve的过去分词形式）

trans.tranCn: 使失去勇气；使身心交疲；使焦躁；使失常
trans.tranOther: to upset or frighten someone so that they lose their confidence or their ability to think clearly
